articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: EU backs Croatia’s entry into Schengen, rejects Bulgaria, Romania - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The European Council approves the admission of Croatia to the passport-free Schengen area from January 1.
articles.content:
European Union members have confirmed the admission of Croatia to the blocs passport-free Schengen area while rejecting the candidacies of Bulgaria and Romania.
The decisions came on Thursday during… [+4368 chars]

articles.title: Celine Dion cancels shows due to 'rare neurological disorder' - News24
articles.description: Celine Dion cancelled and postponed a series of European shows on Thursday over problems related to a "very rare neurological disorder" that is affecting her singing.
articles.content:
• Celine Dion has cancelled shows for her Courage World Tour revealing she is suffering from a "very rare neurological disorder" affecting her singing.
